examples.title: Inefficient Loop
examples.description: This example demonstrates an inefficient way to sum numbers.
examples.code:
total = 0
for i in range(1, 11):
    total += i
print(total)

examples.title: Unstructured Function
examples.description: This example shows a function that lacks structure and readability.
examples.code:
def calculate_area(length, width):
    area = length * width
    return area
print(calculate_area(5, 3))
examples.refactored_code:
def calculate_area(length, width):
    """Calculate the area of a rectangle given its length and width."""
    return length * width

if __name__ == "__main__":
    length = 5
    width = 3
    print(f"The area is {calculate_area(length, width)}")
